dmca.title: DMCA Notice & Takedown
dmca.body:
ATTENTION OPERATORS OF http://www.masturbia.com

IT HAS COME TO OUR ATTENTION THAT YOU ARE IN VIOLATION OF OUR
COPYRIGHTS RE: DMCA (Digital Millenium Copyright Act). The URL
[http://www.masturbia.com/lite.html] has stolen
images, text, and design from our site, and is illegally using them.

THE FOLLOWING URLS AND IMAGES CONTAIN COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT:
[private]

Intentional unauthorized use of an image subjects you to potential
liability for statutory damages of up to $150,000 per work infringed
(under 17 U.S.C. Section 504(c)), plus any costs and attorneys' fees
incurred by us in pursuing legal recourse against you (17 U.S.C.
section 505).  The Copyright Act also allows for
the seizure of your equipment (17 U.S.C. Section 503).

Additionally, a copy of this letter is being sent to your service
provider.  Thus, your service provider is now on notice that its
facilities are being used to infringe copyrights of us, and risks
being held contributorily liable for any further infringements. If
your service provider chooses to avail itself of the protections
provided under the new Online Copyright Infringement Liability
Limitation Act (17 U.S.C. 512), this letter serves as a request for
the URL listing the service provider's Designated Agent for complaint
handling required by 17 U.S.C. 512(c)(2) and as a request for the
required termination policy required in 17 U.S.C. Section
512(c)(i)(A)(iii).

****I ask that you immediately cease and desist from these and any other
activities that infringe our rights.  I request that you remove all
uses of the photographs from your site/HTML.  I also request that you
contact me within 24 hours so we can discuss a fair settlement.  We
are extremely concerned about any unauthorized uses of our property
and will not hesitate to enforce our rights by all available and
lawful means.*****

We reserve each and every one of our rights and remedies in this
matter, none of which has been waived, whether now existing or
whether hereafter asserted, including the right to commence
litigation against you, or any service providers hosting your
material, and any other person or persons acting in concert with you,
without further notice to any of you. Your prompt response will
greatly determine what our next step will be.

Unless you cease and desist within 24 hours we WILL take legal action
in the form of a lawsuit against you and your associates.

Please e-mail us back ASAP letting us know what actions you have
taken.


--

[private]
